comment.title: Only Set This Tag If You Want To Override The Default Collision Damage Values In Globals.Globals

reflexive.name: Interpolation
reflexive.comment: the damping ratio is c/(2*sqrt(k)). if this ratio is: = 0 : oscillates forever < 1 : oscillates with decreasing amplitude = 1 : reaches the target precisely and quickly (no oscillation) > 1 : reaches the target slowly the higher the value of k, the quicker the system will reach the target value

reflexive.name: Spawn Effects
reflexive.comment: Effect played when an object of this type spawns in during each game mode. Unlike creation effect, it is only played when the object spawns in through certain methods, not whenever one is created.

reflexive.comment: All these fields are additive, meaning a negative number will reduce energy and a positive one will increase energy. Every piece of equipment starts at 1.0 energy

reflexive.name: Stasis Field
reflexive.comment: The effective rate at which time passes for objects in the field. Values below 0.45 screw up jumping.

reflexive.name: Jet Pack

bit.name: Use Camera And Movement For Thrust Dir

reflexive.comment: These apply if 'Use camera and movement for thrust dir' flag is checked

float32.name: Camera Vs Move Input Thrust Control

reflexive.name: Teleporter
reflexive.comment: This causes you to warp forward. It'll trace the path with an effect at the specified speed, then spawn you at the end of it.
If "force along aim vector" isn't checked, the start vector will be your motion vector, plus some amount of weight for where you're looking, if you're moving along your look vector.
If "disable extra probes" isn't checked, we'll do a fan of rays vertically from our central vector, with one probe horizontally on either side of each of those rays.
